Description_lang: Rain of Fire damage is increased by $s2% and its Soul Shard cost is reduced by ${$s1/-10}.

description_blz.en_US: Rain of Fire damage is increased by 20% and its Soul Shard cost is reduced by 1.
description_blz.es_MX: El daño de Lluvia de fuego aumenta un 20% y su costo en fragmentos de alma se reduce en 1.
description_blz.pt_BR: O dano de Chuva de Fogo é aumentado em 20%, e o custo de Estilhaço de Alma é reduzido em 1.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den Schaden von 'Feuerregen' um 20% und verringert die Seelensplitterkosten um 1.
description_blz.en_GB: Rain of Fire damage is increased by 20% and its Soul Shard cost is reduced by 1.
description_blz.es_ES: El daño de Lluvia de Fuego aumenta un 20%, y su coste de fragmentos de alma se reduce en 1.
description_blz.fr_FR: Dégâts de Pluie de feu augmentés de 20 %. Son coût en éclats d’âme est réduit de 1.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni da fuoco inflitti da Pioggia di Fuoco del 20% e ne riduce il costo in frammenti d'anima di 1.
description_blz.ru_RU: Урон от "Огненного ливня" увеличивается на 20%, а затраты осколков души на его применение сокращаются на 1.
description_blz.ko_KR: 불의 비의 공격력이 20%만큼 증가합니다. 영혼의 조각 소모량이 1만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 火焰之雨的傷害提高20%，且消耗的靈魂裂片降低1塊。
description_blz.zh_CN: 火焰之雨的伤害提高20%，消耗的灵魂碎片减少1个。
